text.text: Temperature is the prime mechanic of Cold Sweat. Like hunger and health, it is a resource that must be monitored and properly managed. When the player's core temperature reaches a critical point, either too low or too high, death is imminent unless the problem can be quickly resolved.
There is a temperature indicator above your hotbar. It indicates the ambient temperture. 0 is good. Red numbers are getting hotter. Blue, getting colder.
